content: this is a summary of a legal text about a mutual consent divorce case the parties involved mr and mrs names omitted have decided to proceed with a divorce and have reached an agreement on various aspects such as property division child custody financial obligations and maintenance they have also agreed on the residence arrangements for the children and the contribution towards their expenses the document mentions the establishment of a joint bank account and the waiver of maintenance payments between the spouses the parties have chosen to file a joint petition for divorce in a specific family court and the costs of the proceedings will be shared equally the text explains the progress of the legal cause including the registration of a document the parties acknowledgement of potential conflicts of interest and the notarys role in informing the parties about their rights and obligations the parties confirm their acceptance of the clauses in the document and the notary verifies their identities based on required documents a deed was created and the names dates and places of birth of the individuals involved were verified a fee was paid to the notary for the creation of the deed which was read and explained to the parties before they signed it
